name: Tornado ECR
overview: Tornado ECR is a 2D side-scrolling shoot'em up. The game offers three types of planes: Spitfire, Tornado ECT or Warhawk. The plane flies forward automatically and can only be moved up or down. The goal is to shoot enemy planes, based on German World War II planes like the Heinkel He-111. For each next level more planes need to be destroyed. Along the way various bonuses can be collected, providing more firepower or an extra life, but they power-up icons can be destroyed by accident when they are shot.
